snippet: The book, which is scheduled for release in 2016, will focus on The Washington Star, where Mr. Bernstein started in the business at 16.
abstract: Journalist Carl Bernstein strikes deal to write memoir entitled The Washington Star, which will chronicle his early years as a cub reporter for renowned former newspaper The Washington Star.
lead_paragraph: The book, which is scheduled for release in 2016, will focus on The Washington Star, where Mr. Bernstein started in the business at 16.

headline.main: Carl Bernstein Plans Memoir on His Cub Reporter Days
